roleset.name: natural disaster: stretch of very high temperatures
roleset.note: HEATWAVE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. (from heatwave.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: arg1, tmp
example.text: So set your clocks back to November last year, just after a heatwave of 110*F days in October ...
